summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated July 23, 2019, reporting that Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell the previous night, possibly due to a suicide attempt. The email is marked as high importance and appears to be an internal communication about a critical incident involving Epstein while in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; reported as found unresponsive in his cell, possibly due to a suicide attempt.

events.title: Epstein found unresponsive in cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell, with the email suggesting it was possibly a suicide attempt.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell on or around July 22, 2019.
The incident was described as possibly a suicide attempt.
The communication originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating official awareness of the event.
